name: ecommerce-website
description: E-commerce website with React frontend and Node.js backend

scripts.build-client: cd client && REACT_APP_API_URL=https://ecommerce-website-3-9ze3.onrender.com npm run build && cd .. && node copy-build.js
scripts.install-all: npm run install-client && npm run install-server
scripts.build-all: npm run build-client && npm run build-server
scripts.vercel-build: npm run install-all && npm run build-all
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm start"

author: Subhajit Das
